name: Moore's Law Bowling
description:
Rack up some serious points with this Moore’s law inspired 2D bowling game. Moore’s Law Bowling features an exponential scoring scheme, several special bowling ball types, and an opportunity for endless fun with a classic pastime.

Tap rapidly while the ball is rolling to increase the power of a ball to maximize the number of pins you knock down — it’ll come in handy as your ball will get lighter and lighter the more you score.

Moore’s Law Bowling uses a unique scoring system. Every other roll increases the multiplier exponentially which in turn increases the points awarded for each roll. Scores can reach astronomical numbers very quickly.

Every strike rewards you with two free rolls. Every spare rewards you with one free roll. The number of rolls for a single game has no limit.
